results.title: Carotid Artery Temperature Reduction with Statin Therapy in Patients with Familial Hyperlipidemia Syndromes
results.text_hl: Of them, 40 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (19 @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@heFH@@@ and 21 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCH@@@), 41 @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin + ezetimibe@@@ (31 @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@heFH@@@ and 10 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCH@@@), and 34 (21 @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@heFH@@@ and 13 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCH@@@) no statin.

citations.NLM: Benetos G, Galanakos S, Koutagiar I, Skoumas I, Oikonomou G, Drakopoulou M, Karmpalioti M, Katsi V, Tsioufis C, Toutouzas K. Carotid Artery Temperature Reduction with Statin Therapy in Patients with Familial Hyperlipidemia Syndromes J Clin Med. 2021 Oct 27;10(21):. PMID: 34768528
